sentences.en: "They play classic rock'n"roll,' states her boyfriend, "My dad digs them too."
sentences.cn: “他们演奏经典摇滚乐，”她的男朋友说道，“我爸爸也喜欢他们。”

sentences.en: A roll of fat jiggled on the underside of her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊下侧有一层肥肉一颤一颤的。

sentences.en: As the town clock struck two, they heard the roll of drums.
sentences.cn: 当小镇的时钟敲响两点钟时，他们听到了隆隆的鼓声。

sentences.en: banks are several businesses rolled into one.
sentences.cn: 银行是合为一体的几种不同企业。

sentences.en: He rolled his shoulders back.
sentences.cn: 他转动双肩。

sentences.en: His sleeves were rolled above his elbows.
sentences.cn: 他的袖子卷到了胳膊肘的上面。

sentences.en: hot soup served with crusty rolls
sentences.cn: 配有酥皮面包卷的热汤

sentences.en: If you overcook the pancakes they will be difficult to roll.
sentences.cn: 如果薄饼烙久了，就很难卷起来。

sentences.en: It rapidly became apparent that rock'n'roll was a very broad church indeed.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐实际无所不包，这一点很快就显而易见了。

sentences.en: More and more frequently the vessel lurched into a sudden roll.
sentences.cn: 船不时会猛烈摇晃一下，而且越来越频繁。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialised and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 摇滚乐自从朋克乐以后就已经过于商业化而缺乏新意了。

sentences.en: Rock'n'roll has become so commercialized and safe since punk.
sentences.cn: 自朋克乐之后，摇滚乐已经变得太商业化、太保守了。

sentences.en: Roll out the pastry and cut into narrow strips.
sentences.cn: 把油酥面团擀薄然后切成长条。

sentences.en: rolled up quite a fortune.
sentences.cn: 积累了一大笔财富

sentences.en: So what is really happening as the information bandwagon starts to roll?
sentences.cn: 当信息大潮滚滚而来的时候究竟发生了些什么呢？

sentences.en: The ball rolled into the street.
sentences.cn: 球滚到了街上。

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: The group's problems have led to speculation that heads will roll.
sentences.cn: 已经有人猜测，该集团的问题会导致一些人被解雇。

sentences.en: the organization is on a roll.
sentences.cn: 这个组织接二连三地走运。

sentences.en: The ship adjusted herself to the roll and rhythm of the sea.
sentences.cn: 船随着海水的起伏节奏时起时落。

sentences.en: There was silence as the cameras started to roll.
sentences.cn: 摄影机开始转动，大家安静了下来。

sentences.en: They just goof around, roll around on the floor and fight.
sentences.cn: 他们整日就是瞎闹，在地上摸爬滚打。

sentences.en: wallpaper costing £3 a roll
sentences.cn: 3英镑一卷的壁纸

sentences.en: We'll give her some VIP treatment and roll out the red carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们将给予她贵宾级礼遇，并且为她铺设红地毯。

words.tran_cn: [机] 滚筒；[机] 滚轴；辊子；滚转机
使…转动；摇摆（roll的过去分词和过去式）

phrases.phrase: a roll in the hay (或 the sack)

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)非常富有，在钱里打滚
热轧，热轧卷；加热压光辊
(非正式)连连获胜；连续交好运
vt. 滚动卷页；滚过去，慢移过去
蜂拥而来；[口]有大量的（钱财等）；[美俚]就寝；到达
&I{【橄榄球】} 前卫的横移突破
投资：把（从到期证券中得来的资金）再投资到类似的证券中
（拳击手）避让对方打击以减轻受打击的力
（把不同的人或物的特点）合为一体的
(非正式)（观众）笑得东倒西歪；捧腹大笑

trans.tran_cn: 卷，管，面包卷，翻滚，摇晃，赘肉，名册，隆隆声，掷骰子
trans.tran_en: a piece of paper, camera film, money etc that has been rolled into the shape of a tube
if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over
if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over

trans.tran_cn: 卷，摇，转，（使）滚动，翻转，压平，发出持续声音，启动，缓缓行进，抢劫
trans.tran_en: if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over
if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over
if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over
